message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $17,000. It's a great deal and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I appreciate the value you see in the product, but I'm only willing to go up to $14,000.  Let me know what you think.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal. While I appreciate your offer,  $14,000 is simply too low. I'm willing to come down a bit, but I need at least $15,500 to make this work. Let's meet in the middle.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price.  I'm still only able to go up to $15,000.  If we can agree on that, we have a deal.  Let me know what you think.
